title: Memes and "temes"
description: Susan Blackmore studies memes: ideas that replicate themselves from brain to brain like a virus. She makes a bold new argument: Humanity has spawned a new kind of meme, the teme, which spreads itself via technology -- and invents ways to keep itself alive
author: Susan Blackmore
keywords: TED, talks, brain, culture, design, evolution, meme, technology
